original_text: People at the feast drank from gold cups. Each cup was different. The king gave plenty of his own wine to everyone to drink.
korean_text: 금 잔으로 마시게 하니 잔의 모양이 각기 다르고 왕이 풍부하였으므로 어주가 한이 없으며

sentences.original_text: People at the feast drank from gold cups
The king gave plenty of his own wine to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 자신의 포도주를 모두에게 풍부하게 주었습니다
